ygData.subject: Re: Destructors return
ygData.msgSnippet: Foxfingers skimmed over the ocean creating a wake in the water below as he flew. He was instructed to monitor any frequencies coming from or going to the pod.

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Foxfingers skimmed over the ocean creating a wake in the water below as he
flew. He was instructed to monitor any frequencies coming from or going to
the pod.

"DRILLBIT IT IS DESTRUCTOR I HAVE RETURNED." he heard suddenly. He slammed
on the breaks almost falling off listening for more information.

Drillbits reply came through almost on cue sending chills through the
fox."Welcome back, Destructor..."

Foxfingers radiod back to Veratis that he was abandoning the pod, one
meeting with that group was enough to last a life time.




----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 4:48 PM
Subject: Destructors return


> ::DrillBit::
>
> The comm from Destructor came over the comm channels.
> 'Destructor! Alive!', he thought. He opened a commlink.
> "Welcome back, Destructor..."
> DrillBit really wasn't happy. He didn't much like Destructor. Mostly
> because he always hit on KitKat. Even after they were ingaged to be wed.
> And he was an arrogent jerk.
>
>
>
